Name: Create VM via ARM
Description: This step template is specific for the CS team at Octopus Deploy.  For any updates to this step, please export and save to the [Samples IAC] (https://github.com/OctopusSamples/IaC)

Parameters.Name: CreateVM.Azure.Account
Parameters.Label: Azure Account
Parameters.HelpText: The Azure Account to use to run the ARM Template

Parameters.Name: CreateVM.Azure.ResourceGroup.Name
Parameters.Label: Resource Group Name
Parameters.HelpText: Name of the resource group to create the VM in.

Parameters.Name: CreateVM.Azure.VM.Admin.UserName
Parameters.Label: VM Admin User Name
Parameters.HelpText: The Username for the admin account on the VM.  Cannot be `admin` or `administrator`

Parameters.Name: CreateVM.Azure.VM.Admin.Password
Parameters.Label: VM Admin Password
Parameters.HelpText: The password of the admin user for the VM

Parameters.Name: CreateVM.Azure.ResourceGroup.Location
Parameters.Label: Resource Group Location
Parameters.HelpText: The location, or data center, of the resource group

Parameters.Name: CreateVM.Azure.VM.Name
Parameters.Label: VM Name
Parameters.HelpText: Name of the VM (must be less than 18 characters)

Parameters.Name: CreateVM.Azure.VM.Size
Parameters.Label: VM Size
Parameters.HelpText: The VM Size, for example standard_b2ms, or standard_d2v2

Parameters.Name: CreateVM.Azure.VM.StorageAccount.Name
Parameters.Label: VM Storage Account Name
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the storage account hosting the OS disks which will be created for this VM.

Parameters.Name: CreateVM.Azure.Network.Name
Parameters.Label: VNET Name
Parameters.HelpText: Pre-Existing Virtual Network Name to attach this VM to

Parameters.Name: CreateVM.Azure.Network.ResourceGroup.Name
Parameters.Label: VNET Resource Group Name
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the resource group where the pre-existing VNET lives

Parameters.Name: CreateVM.Azure.Network.Subnet.Name
Parameters.Label: VNET Subnet Name
Parameters.HelpText: The name of the pre-existing subnet in the pre-existing VNET to attach the VM to

Parameters.Name: CreateVM.Octopus.Thumbprint
Parameters.Label: Octopus Thumbprint
Parameters.HelpText: The thumbprint of the Octopus Server so the VM will trust it.

Parameters.Name: CreateVM.Chocolatey.Apps
Parameters.Label: Chocolatey Apps to Install
Parameters.HelpText: A csv list of [chocolatey apps](https://chocolatey.org) to pre-install

Parameters.Name: CreateVM.Dism.Apps
Parameters.Label: DISM Features To Enable
Parameters.HelpText: The csv list of [DISM](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-hardware/manufacture/desktop/dism---deployment-image-servicing-and-management-technical-reference-for-windows) features to enable
